titleStmt.title: Two sermons, preached at the Kings court, this Ianuary, 1620 Concerning Davids adultery, and his politick practices. By Francis Mason, Archdeacon of Norfolk, and Chaplain to his Maiesty in ordinary.
titleStmt.author: Mason, Francis, 1566?-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes] for Nathanael Newbery; and are to bee solde at his shop, under Saint Peters Church in Cornehill and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop, under Saint Peters Church in Cornehill
